conclusion: Analyze the image to understand the arrangement of charges.
The image shows a parallel-plate capacitor with a positive charge on the left plate and a negative charge on the right plate. A point charge q is at the midpoint.
Calculate the force on q due to +Q using Coulomb's Law: F_{+Q} = kQq/d².
Calculate the force on q due to -Q: F_{-Q} = -kQq/d².
Net force on q is F_{net} = F_{+Q} + F_{-Q} = 0.
Ensure the standard answer 2kQq/d² corresponds to the correct interpretation.
The force experienced by q is F = (2kQq)/d².
